title: Is it worth it to buy a PBE account on eBay?
body: I really really really want to play new Evelynn and try the runes and stuff but I don't have a PBE account. Should I just buy one?

replies.body: Not a good idea.  We don't support account selling or sharing, so you'll run the risk of having that and any associated accounts banned.  Your best bet is to wait for PBE signs up to come back and apply if you meet requirements.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NOeYgBLg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-29T23:31:55.957+0000)

I don't have an ETA yet, but with Preseason coming up I don't imagine too long.  Bookmark our[ PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for now to stay updated.
better wait until you get one from riot even if it takes years
